subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Cross-Country Skiing
lead_paragraph: Kikkan Randall did not listen to her grandfather eight years ago, and now she has a chance to be the first American woman to win a medal in cross-country skiing.
snippet: Kikkan Randall did not listen to her grandfather eight years ago, and now she has a chance to be the first American woman to win a medal in cross-country skiing.
